about_the_game:
You play as lost in space HERO. Yours ship went completely off course and was destroyed. You have some limited oxygen in portable tank and some energy in yours weapon, you have jetpack and some few other tools.

Now is time to REBUILD.

Collect resources and REBUILD everything from scratch. Get resources from asteroids, comets, planets. Rebuild Yours SHIP and defend it from countless waves of enemy. Equip ship with systems: life support, rockets, food production, weapons and more. Fly space ship and discover planetary systems, asteroids fields; drill whole planets with advanced BUILDS to get more resources faster. Mix those resources in MIXERS and deliver specific product to ship systems. Create production lines to get: oxygen, rocket fuel, food, water and more. All those products could be created in few different ways. Use PIPES system to connect and deliver resources.

Research SKILLS and BUILDS to advance in game, to create stronger better weapons, better ship systems. Thrive in outer space and build massive space ships so enemy will not stand a chance.

Demo of game is available.

Demo has 30 minutes time limit and some other aspect of game are locked (load/save ...etc)

short_description: 2d pixel art, top down sci- fi space ship building, resource management simulation with some arcade, tower defense elements. You build spaceship, collect necessary resources and defend yourself against waves of enemies. Equip ship with: rockets, life support, electric system and weapons.
